JOB DESCRIPTION: What are my Job Responsibilities?     You should have Hands-on with C#.Net, WPF desktop application development.   You should have working knowledge of unit test tools / methodologies (like TDD).   You Should be able to effectively investigate reported software defects, debugging skills.   You should be able to communicate clearly and effectively at various levels - intra team, inter group, spoken skills, written skills - including email, presentation and articulation skills.       What do I need to be Eligible for this Role?     An engineering degree B.E/B.Tech/MCA/M.Tech/M.Sc.   1 - 3 Years of Relevant experience in C#.Net, WPF desktop application development.   Experience with Angular framework will be added advantage.   We will prefer candidates who can independently handle assigned tasks and are self-motivated   Exposure to Building Automation domain would be an added advantage

EDUCATION.PG: MCA in Computers, MS/M.Sc(Science) in Chemistry, M.Tech in Electronics/Telecommunication
